author: Xbox
description:

The Scavenger's Haul Battle Pass (available in Season 2: Power Surge) unlocks the new War Robot Loki, with 35+ other electrifying rewards to hunt down.

author: Xbox
description:
Use iconic local businesses to funnel dirty cash into your criminal network in Money Fronts, today’s new update to GTA Online.

The head of San Andreas’ biggest money laundering network has heard about you, and it's time to form a mutually beneficial connection. Conspire with the very powerful — and very private — Mr. Faber and his sharply dressed consigliere Raf De Angelis to bring financial sophistication to your criminal enterprise.

Scrub your network’s bottom line at the Hands On Car Wash, then expand your portfolio to include the Smoke on the Water dispensary and Higgins Helitours.

Plus, collect new vehicles including the Western Police Bike and the sizzling new Överflöd Suzume supercar, lend your problem-solving expertise to the man behind the scenes in Mr. Faber Work, and more.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/grand-theft-auto-online-xbox-series-xs/9NKC1Z4Z92VN

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com/xbox 
https://www.facebook.com/xbox
title: GTA Online: Money Fronts

author: Xbox
description:
Prepare for a power surge in Season 17: Powered Up!
Sigma, Zenyatta, and Junkrat are joining the Stadium roster! Alongside them are 2 new maps - Esperança and Samoa, and the new Stadium Forge tool that lets you create, save, and share your builds like never before.

For the first time ever, both the Mythic Horang D.Va Hero Skin and Mythic Steel Death Reaper Weapon Skin are dropping at launch! Go wild in style or wield something sinister when you conquer the Premium Battle Pass and unlock up to 80 Mythic Prisms.

And that’s not all the Premium Battle Pass has to offer! Go from high school to high scores with the new Overwatch Academy and 8-Bit Legendary Skins, perfect for any playstyle.

Season 17 is also bringing Map Voting to Quick Play and Competitive, and the vibrant new Flashpoint map, Aatlis! In addition to a new Flashpoint map comes reworked versions of New Junk City and Suravasa, arriving mid Season 17.

And we’ve only scratched the surface! Dive into our limited-time 8-Bit gam
title: Season 17: Powered Up! Official Trailer | Overwatch 2

description:
We’ve established a strategic, multi-year agreement with AMD to co-engineer silicon across a portfolio of devices, including our next-generation Xbox consoles. Together, we’re delivering deeper visual quality, immersive gameplay, and AI-powered experiences - grounded in a platform designed for players, not tied to a single store or device, and fully compatible with your existing Xbox game library.

description:
Check out what critics are saying about Blue Prince, the atmospheric architecture adventure set in the mysterious Mount Holly Manor, with its 45 shifting rooms. 

This genre-defying puzzle strategy adventure is out now on Xbox Series X|S, Windows, and Game Pass!

So prepare to draft rooms, unravel mysteries, solve puzzles, and develop architectural strategies as you try to track down the mysterious “Room 46”.

author: Xbox
description:
Rooftops & Alleys is more than just a game about Parkour & Freerunning. It’s the adrenaline rush of landing an impossible trick combo, defying gravity, and feeling like you’re flying… until you crash face-first into a dark alley 30 meters below.

In solo or with your friends, explore in total freedom massive-parkour-ready maps. Reach every corner of your playground to uncover hidden spots — time trials, trick challenges, and more! In multiplayer, dive into game modes like TAG, Capture the Flag, Trick Battles, or simply freeroam with your friends!

- Explore huge, unique, vertical parkour environments
- Discover, learn, and master every trick, move, and their endless combo possibilities
- Call on your pigeon to discover new areas, fast travel, and plan your routes
- Tons of challenges and game modes — solo or with friends (TAG, Capture the Flag, Trick Battles, and more)
- Unlock over 100 customization options for yourself and your pigeon

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/rooftops-alley
title: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game - Launch Trailer
